pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.3GHz and above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.3GHz and above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
